text: 1.11: Mt 24.30; 26.64; Ru 21.27; Zo 14.3; 1 Te 1.10; 4.16; VB 1.7Mani thɨgap khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde kha Gariri gumgi, nde thaŋ nzuav thivgiap, fhura khoga kha buiva garav ki? Kha guma Zisas, Fhe Bakɨme ntigem ana ndigim, ana nde thav Hevenan ndagi. Ana zumgum, nde ana ganɨnga, ana ntigem Hevenan ndagi tɨvara muuŋgip, ana taagi Hevenan kegɨp zirɨrga.”
